children.text:
+ System: For each MoveArea
+ MoveArea: ID = ButtonTrigger.ID
----+ MoveArea: Is GrabOnStart
--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping PinnableSprites
---------> (no actions)

--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping PinnableTBG
---------> (no actions)

+ System: For each MoveArea
+ MoveArea: ID = ButtonTrigger.ID
----+ MoveArea: Is GrabOnStart
--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping PinnableSprites
---------> (no actions)

--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping PinnableTBG
---------> (no actions)

actions.script:
const button = runtime.objects.ButtonTrigger.getFirstPickedInstance();
button.Activate = new Function("sdkSelf", "runtime", button.instVars.OnActivate).bind(button, sdk_runtime.GetInstanceByUID(button.uid), runtime);

children.text:
+ System: For each MoveArea
+ MoveArea: ID = ButtonTrigger.ID
-> (no actions)

+ System: On start of layout
----+ System: For each MoveArea
--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping MvArea
---------> Browser: Log in console: "Collision !"
---------> Browser: Log in console: "Move Area ID number " & MoveArea.IID
------------+ System: For each MvArea
-------------> Browser: Log in console: "Move Area ID number " & MvArea.IID
                | Local number CurImportance‎ = 0
                | Local number CurUID‎ = 0
----------------+ MvArea: Is Nested
-----------------> System: Set CurImportance to MoveArea.Importance
-----------------> System: Set CurUID to MoveArea.UID
--------------------+ System: Pick all MoveArea
--------------------+ MoveArea: Pick instance with UID MvArea.Parent
------------------------+ System: CurImportance > MoveArea.Importance
----------------------------+ System: Pick all MoveArea
----------------------------+ MoveArea: Pick instance with UID CurUID
--------------------------------+ System: MvArea.Importance > MoveArea.Importance
---------------------------------> MvArea: Set Parent to MoveArea.UID
---------------------------------> MvArea: Set Nested to True
---------------------------------> MvArea: Set OffsetX to MvArea.X - MoveArea.X
---------------------------------> MvArea: Set OffsetX to MvArea.Y - MoveArea.Y

--------------------------------+ System: MvArea.Importance < MoveArea.Importance
---------------------------------> MoveArea: Set Parent to MvArea.UID
---------------------------------> MoveArea: Set Nested to True
---------------------------------> MoveArea: Set OffsetX to MoveArea.X - MvArea.X
---------------------------------> MoveArea: Set OffsetY to MoveArea.Y - MvArea.Y

----------------+ System: Else
--------------------+ System: MvArea.Importance > MoveArea.Importance
---------------------> MvArea: Set Parent to MoveArea.UID
---------------------> MvArea: Set Nested to True
---------------------> MvArea: Set OffsetX to MvArea.X - MoveArea.X
---------------------> MvArea: Set OffsetX to MvArea.Y - MoveArea.Y

--------------------+ System: MvArea.Importance < MoveArea.Importance
---------------------> MoveArea: Set Parent to MvArea.UID
---------------------> MoveArea: Set Nested to True
---------------------> MoveArea: Set OffsetX to MoveArea.X - MvArea.X
---------------------> MoveArea: Set OffsetY to MoveArea.Y - MvArea.Y

----+ System: For each MoveArea
--------+ MoveArea: Is Nested
---------> MoveArea: Set animation frame to 1

----+ System: For each PinnableSprites
--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping PinnableSprites
--------+ MoveArea: Pick instance with highest Importance
---------> (no actions)

----+ (no conditions)
--------+ MoveArea: Pick instance with highest Importance
---------> (no actions)

----+ System: For each PinnableTBG
--------+ MoveArea: Is overlapping PinnableTBG
--------+ MoveArea: Pick instance with highest Importance
---------> (no actions)

+ System: For each MoveArea
----+ MoveArea: Is Nested
        | Local number ParX‎ = 0
        | Local number ParY‎ = 0
        | Local number ParAngle‎ = 0
--------+ MvArea: Pick instance with UID MoveArea.Parent
---------> System: Set ParX to MvArea.X
---------> System: Set ParY to MvArea.Y
---------> System: Set ParAngle to MvArea.Angle

parameters.value: lerp(Laser.X, Laser.X + Laser.Width * cos(Laser.Angle), unlerp(0, Laser.Width/Intervalle, loopindex))
lerp(Laser.Y, Laser.Y + Laser.Width * sin(Laser.Angle), unlerp(0, Laser.Width/Intervalle, loopindex))

parameters.x: lerp(Laser.X, Laser.X + Laser.Width * cos(Laser.Angle), unlerp(0, Laser.Width/Intervalle, loopindex))
parameters.y: lerp(Laser.Y, Laser.Y + Laser.Width * sin(Laser.Angle), unlerp(0, Laser.Width/Intervalle, loopindex))

parameters.vector-x: vx * cos(startAngle - Self.Platform.GravityAngle) - vy * sin(startAngle - Self.Platform.GravityAngle)

parameters.vector-y: vy * cos(startAngle - Self.Platform.GravityAngle) + vx * sin(startAngle - Self.Platform.GravityAngle)

actions.text: These conditions are only there to save on performance, you can remove them if you don't need them
